Fergus was a mercenary soldier and a member of the Flaming Fist who lived in Baldurs Gate during the midâˆ’14 century DR.
At least for a while, Fergus was stationed at High Hall in the Temples District of the Upper City.
Fergus had a paramour he referred to has "his lady", and was wholly in love with her.
In the , Fergus received a letter from his love saying she would come home to Baldurs Gate very soon. He planned on obtaining an angel skin ring to offer his love upon her return to the city.
